thread.title: 'Secretive' Nick Jonas won't speak of hook up with Kate Hudson
thread.title_full: 'Secretive' Nick Jonas won't speak of hook up with Kate Hudson - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: 'Secretive' Nick Jonas won't speak of hook up with Kate Hudson
text:
If you were wishing for some scoop on Nick Jonas' rumoured affair with Kate Hudson, then you are barking up the wrong tree, as the singer has said he won't spill the beans on his private life.
READ: Nick Jonas will be the next Justin Timberlake
When the 23-year-old singer was asked about his affair with the 36-year-old actress, he said he wouldn't talk about it, as he prefers keeping some things to himself, reports the Mirror.
For latest Music updates, follow us on Twitter >>> @TOIEntertain
For the latest in Music news, like us on Facebook >>> TOIEntertain
The 'Strange' hit-maker further said that it is a strange place where little things turn into a lot. But, it is also about how much of that you allow in your world and live knowing that people will have their opinion.
For more interesting Music news and pictures, follow us on Pinterest>>> timesofindia
